SELECT seq, main, type, number, contact_seq FROM contact_phone WHERE 1=1 AND seq=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contact_phone ( main, type, number, contact_seq ) VALUES ( #{main}, #{type}, #{number}, #{contact_seq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE contact_phone SET main=#{main}, type=#{type}, number=#{number} WHERE seq=#{seq}
